original_text: That is how I have decided to punish you. It is what you deserve because you have forgotten me. You have trusted in false gods. That is how I have decided to punish you. It is what you deserve because you have forgotten me. You have trusted in false gods. That is how I have decided to punish you. It is what you deserve because you have forgotten me. You have trusted in false gods. That is how I have decided to punish you.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 이는 네 몫이요 내가 헤아려 정하여 네게 준 분깃이니 네가 나를 잊어버리고 거짓을 신뢰하는 까닭이라

sentences.original_text: That is how I have decided to punish you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내가 너를 벌하기로 결정한 방식이다.

sentences.original_text: You have trusted in false gods.
That is how I have decided to punish you.
